item.description:
Spring is here and its time to get back outside! I am looking to get a lot of people together for a full day of Top Roping. I plan to get there before 10 and set up my own ropes so that they will be ready to go at ten.

I will need at least a few more experienced climbers with their own ropes and anchors so we have multiple routes to work on.

New climbers are welcome though I encourage you to bring your own gear (harness, shoes, belay device) and I ask that you take a belay course at a local gym. Both Metrorock and Boston Rock Gym have nightly belay classes.

Dress warm and bring a bag lunch. I will bring a stove so we can boil water for cocoa. Bring your own mug!!!

Please answer the questions on the RSVP so I know who will be bring additional ropes and so we can set up a carpool.

For directions and cliff description, go to this site:

RC.com
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the guy in the red Down Coat.
item.name: Spring Climbing at Quincy Quarry
